text: Katyń is a 2007 Polish movie about the 1940 Katyn massacre. It was directed by Andrzej Wajda. == Other websites == * Category:2007 drama movies Category:2000s war movies Category:2000s historical movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies about massacres Category:Movies directed by Andrzej Wajda
title: Katyń (movie)
